name: ShineG In Future Factory
detailed_description:
As a new work, Shine continues to debut.It retains the advantages of the previous game.Lots of enemies, cute pictures, familiar strategic thinking.And this time we add additional new content and new attempt.

The things that players need to do are simple.

1: Constantly explore new scenes.
2: Move the squares so that the same squares are connected in a straight line and eliminated.
3: Eliminate the box, attack the robot.
4: Eliminate the more squares, Shine attack more powerful.
5: As far as possible to survive.

Game background

In the robot world, there was a riot in the space factory.A large number of robot runaway attacks on the world.The world has become extremely unstable, about to usher in destruction.Shine received the notice, ready to go to the robot world, eliminate mutations, to restore stability to the world.Shine embarked on a new journey.

Game scene

New space factory and other scenes.

Game character

Shine continues her fantasy journey.

short_description: Thank you for the ShineG support.This is a casual game.Shine attacks the enemy as we eliminate the square.The more the elimination of the box, Shine will get stronger fighting force.The game has a certain strategic.There are also ranking features.Environment set in the arms factory.Enemies are robots.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 , Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 support
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound card
